channel.title: How do i add players to spawn items
channel.description: I want to know how players can spawn items but if they try to spawn a rare it cost money. For example i want to spawn a blue party hat when i do ::item 1042 1 it will take the money out of my inv and give me the item but if i dont have anymoney it sends them a message 'You dont have enough money" Also if they try to spawn a item and i dont want the item on the server when they try to spawn it it says "You cant spawn that" The server is a 317

item.title: How do i add players to spawn items
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I assume you want this for specific rares? Why not do:
if(command name here|| x money in inventory){
spawn rare item here.
send message saying you spawned it.
} else if (money equal to less then above){
Bitch cause they ain’t got 'nuff cash
}

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add players to spawn items
